directions: Whisk apple juice, caramel syrup, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook and whisk briskly until mixture is hot but not boiling, about 3 minutes. Add vanilla; cook and stir for 1 more minute. Pour into mugs and top with whipped cream.
ingredients: 1/4 cup whipped cream, or to taste (optional)
title: Hot Carmel Apple Juice
